actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 93-1059.

official_title: Resolution; authorization for reprinting additional copies for use of the Committee on the Judiciary of the Committee print entitled "Procedures for Handling Impeachment Inquiry Material".

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides that there shall be reprinted for the use of the House Committee on the Judiciary 5,000 additional copies of the committee print entitled "Procedures for Handling Impeachment Inquiry Material."

titles.title: Resolution; authorization for reprinting additional copies for use of the Committee on the Judiciary of the Committee print entitled "Procedures for Handling Impeachment Inquiry Material".
